column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was our food highlight in Chicago! We ordered "the Lou" deep dish pizza and the stuffed spinach bread as an appetizer. The bread was the bomb & the pizza was so good
column2: the crust was crunchy and did not get soggy despite all the toppings. There is a bit of a wait but understand this is a thick pizza & made to order . Also
column3: their serving sizes are pretty accurate
column4: so unless you intend on leftovers
column5: get the right size for your group !
